src/scss/_variables--colors.scss

Colors

Here is the color palatee for INSERT_PROJECT_NAME. All colors on the site (that aren’t defined in 3rd party plugins) are defined below. Even if the color is only used once.

The $shade-- colors have an alpha transparency, so they are shown on top of a gray/white stripped background to show the translucency of the color.

Use http://chir.ag/projects/name-that-color/ to generate color names. It’s much easier than dreaming up a name for the fourth blue.
